name: DeadFall (itch)
description:
The Spiritual Sequel to "PsychoFall", You fall and navigate your way through three Philosophical Manifestations of death. Fighting your way through the concepts of clarity, you search for peace in death.

DeadFall is a "free fall" arcade shooter where you must avoid obstacles, or the levels "structure beams" and eliminate the clarity manifestations as you fall.

Features:
-Flexible control scheme; Drag anywhere on the screen to move, and tap anywhere on the screen to shoot.
*Using your left thumb to drag around without lifting, and using your right thumb to tap emulates modern console controller experience; Providing an excellent control experience.
-Engaging and Abstract Visuals that alter with distance.
-Adrenaline Pumping Soundtrack.
-Entrancing Exploration

DeadFall Original Game Soundtrack
Available 4-17-15
*Listen To Now on SoundCloud
https://soundcloud.com/micheltmoreno/sets/deadfall-original-soundtrack

A Michael T Moreno Game.

***NOTE
DO NOT PURCHASE OR PLAY IF YOU ARE PRONE TO SEIZURES OR EPILEPTIC EPISODES.
